title: Painfully beautiful
review: Such a great Jared Leto film. But it's a nauseating film - you'll feel sick - it's simply that effective! The musical score is amazing too and great cinematography for its time. Check it out if you haven't already

title: Good fun
review: It's a film that's more about fun than thinking or engaging you in story. That was my opinion anyway - perhaps the more you know about the comics, the less impressed you are I'm guessing.
